message:
Hello {{ doc.customer_name }},

Welcome aboard friend!

It is great to have you onboard Paper Boat! We're all set to sail and take on the rolling seas with you by our side.

Much like the first day of school, we would love for you to get to know us. At Paper Boat we make "drinks and memories" and we would love for you to make them with us! We believe in doing everything with honesty and giving our 100%. We are always looking for new horizons and greater opportunities and do not doubt that your support will help us get there!

We are beyond happy to work with you and cannot wait to change our partnership into a long-standing friendship! Please know that you may reach out to us for anything.

It is our mission to make you more productive by the means of technology! For this we provide below facilities Absolutely Free!
We recommend you to use these facilities actively.

1. Sell Easy App -Helps you to take retailer orders, go through training videos, and update your inventory
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.selleasy  

2. Paper Boat WhatsApp Channel -Reach out to us directly for any feedback or concerns! Senior members of our team will respond you directly.
https://wa.me/919513416168  

3. Paper Boat B2B Sales Platform App -Please the orders to Hector Beverages, get all the notifications and tracking order status online!
http://paper-boat.com/B2B  

Here's to the many adventures that are yet to come,
Your teammates at Paper Boat!
-- Hector Beverage

Note: Please note that the business information provided by you is saved in the system of Hector Beverages Pvt. Ltd. for future reference as per the regulations. Please right back to paperboat@hectorbeverages.com if there are any concerns.
